01-miles-joyces.description:
Our faithful early guests:
Miles (a.k.a. the Phantom of the Opera), Samurai Terry, Keenan the mad scientist, Amanda Panda, and Moses the Wanna-bee. Bzzt.
01-miles-joyces.title: Miles Joyces

02-julie.description: Julie Chiron isn't goth anymore, but she can play the part.
02-julie.title: Julie

03-craig.description: The cub scout uniform pinned to Craig is the actual uniform he wore as a kid. You wouldn't believe how many badges he got!
03-craig.title: Craig

04-sailors.description: Both Jenifer Jenkins and Austin wore sailor outfits, without knowing that the other one was.
04-sailors.title: Sailors

05-fergus.description: Fergus came as Moses. Now, why didn't we ever think of that?
05-fergus.title: Fergus

06-williams.description: Williams wins the prize for most creative costume. Isn't he a scream?
06-williams.title: Williams

07-gorilla.description: Did you know that gorillas drink beer from their nostrils? Pretty gross.
07-gorilla.title: Gorilla

08-heather.description: Here is another one who drinks beer out of a straw. Heather kept her straightjacket all night long. Pretty impressive.
08-heather.title: Heather

09-velmas.description: Mikek and Molly both came as Velma in Scooby-doo. Aren't they adorable?
09-velmas.title: Velmas

10-devil.description: That's our friends who very recently got married on Angel Island. Taylor is the devil. Anna is the Angel of Death.
10-devil.title: Devil

11-devil-kiss.description: The newly-weds enjoy a tender moment.
11-devil-kiss.title: Devil Kiss

12-yum.description: Everyone agreed: Anna had the hottest costume.
12-yum.title: Yum

13-jim.description: Wanna Bee Moses and Sheriff Jim Home.
13-jim.title: Jim

14-jen.description: Jennifer Lynch makes a cute cow-girl.
14-jen.title: Jen

15-adam-allison.description: Father Adam Connoly cheerfully distracts Allison from the noose around her neck.
15-adam-allison.title: Adam Allison

16-crowd.description: Cathy Bacon as Little Bo Peep, Kristie Home the Can-Can dancer, Allison, Mary, Aaron the roadkill bunny, and some unidentified guest... everybody that's anybody made it to our party.
16-crowd.title: Crowd

17-nursery.description: Guests took over Felix's room (we dismantled the crib for the occasion).
17-nursery.title: Nursery

18-velmas.description: Did I mention how adorable the Velmas were?
18-velmas.title: Velmas

19-miles-jane.description: As the party winds down, Miles and Jane Petersen chat in the blue room.
19-miles-jane.title: Miles Jane

description:
There was a lot of beer and home-made sangria; almost everyone came costumed; and there was still a handful of guests around for breakfast the next morning... all signs that this Halloween party was a success!

Return to this week's photos
title: October 27
